programme.episode_description: Liam, Rusty, and Ruby vow to return a caterpillar to its home, at the tippy top of the tallest tree in the jungle!
Rusty and Ruby need Botasaur's help to stop falling meteors that threaten to destroy Dino Island.
Lord Grantchester (Labour)

programme.original_episode_title: Entering and Experiencing Kingdom Citizenship Part 1
programme.episode_description: This teaching is from the series entitled Kingdom First - Rediscovering God’s Priority Volume 4
Heartbeat Episode 25

programme.original_episode_title: Fashion Haul with SKY Host, Vee
programme.episode_description: SKY Host Vee has a thing for fashion and she let us in on what she loves to rock in this Mini Fashion Haul.

programme.original_episode_title: Heifer management, Tomatoes, Peppers & Banana wilt
programme.episode_description: The owner of this beautiful place is Alex Ochieng who’s been a full-time farmer since 1997. He’s 46 years old… can you believe it he was only 21 when he started farming!

programme.original_title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air: Season 1, Episode 14
programme.episode_description: Trouble awaits Will (Will Smith) on his first day of prep school. With Alfonso Ribeiro and James Avery.
How Your Muscles Work
Music
African Music
A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.
A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

programme.local_episode_title: To solve the world's biggest problems, invest in women and girls
programme.original_episode_title: To solve the world's biggest problems, invest in women and girls
programme.episode_description: As CEO of the Global Fund for Women, Musimbi Kanyoro works to support women and their ideas so they can expand and grow. She introduces us to the Maragoli concept of "isirika" -- a pragmatic way of life that embraces the mutual responsibility to care for one another -- something she sees women practicing all over the world. And she calls for those who have more to give more to people working to improve their communities. "Imagine what it would look like if you embraced isirika and made it your default," Kanyoro says. "What could we achieve for each other? For humanity?" Let's find out -- together.

As CEO of the Global Fund for Women, Musimbi Kanyoro works to support women and their ideas so they can expand and grow. She introduces us to the Maragoli concept of "isirika" -- a pragmatic way of life that embraces the mutual responsibility to care for one another -- something she sees women practicing all over the world. And she calls for those who have more to give more to people working to improve their communities. "Imagine what it would look like if you embraced isirika and made it your default," Kanyoro says. "What could we achieve for each other? For humanity?" Let's find out -- together.
Liam, Rusty, and Ruby vow to return a caterpillar to its home, at the tippy top of the tallest tree in the jungle!
Rusty and Ruby need Botasaur's help to stop falling meteors that threaten to destroy Dino Island.
Lord Boateng

Ethiopia is among the hardest-hit countries in terms of deadly traffic accidents. Trains and trucks circulate along infrastructure from another age. For trucks in the south of the country, the transport of goods and people take place in the rain and on slippery roads… There is, however, no alternative, as flying is too expensive and the trains are no longer in working condition, except one. This one train travels through half of the country, from the city of Dire Dawa to the border at Djibouti. It travels 310 kilometres over the course of more than 10 hours – on a good day. This last known working train is no stranger to derailments and breaks down on a regular basis. It is the oldest but also the most dangerous train in the world! From the Danakil desert to the rainy summits of the Kaffa region, welcome to Ethiopia!
How Your Heart Works

programme.original_episode_title: Do Scandalous Text Messages Mean He's Not the Father?
programme.episode_description: 1. Martin v. Damphier - A California man refuses to believe that he is the biological father of his on-again off-again girlfriend’s four-year-old daughter after he finds scandalous text messages in her phone.

programme.original_episode_title: Best Friend Betrayal and Paternity Doubts
programme.episode_description: 1. Dayman v. Osborne - Her best friend texted her boyfriend that he’s not the father and now a Michigan woman is in court to prove paternity and save her relationship.
A trip to Botswana is approaching, and Christall is under pressure to deliver on her promise. Naledi hosts her mother's 50th birthday party, but will it live up to everyone's expectations?

Clemantine Wamariya was six years old when the Rwandan Civil War forced her and her sister to flee their home in Kigali, leaving their parents and everything they knew behind. In this deeply personal talk, she tells the story of how she became a refugee, living in camps in seven countries over the next six years -- and how she's tried to make sense of what came after.

programme.original_title: SpikeTV's World's Most Amazing Videos Episode 28
programme.original_episode_title: SpikeTV's World's Most Amazing Videos Episode 28
programme.episode_description: SpikeTV's World's Most Amazing Videos Episode 28
Music
African Music

Rüzgar goes to Bosnia after losing the woman he loves in a car crash two years ago, to run away from everything and everyone but mostly his memories.. He doesn’t make contact with anyone for two years, including his family. His uncle Kemaç and his mother Vahide who is the owner of a major corporation in Turkey, find Ruzgar after long efforts. So Kemal goes to Bosnia to bring Rüzgar back. But Rüzgar is still heartbroken. He can’t live like this so he runs away after a family dinner without telling anyone. He finds himself in Foça after meeting with a taxi driver. Meanwhile Zeynep is about to marry her childhood love Kutay. There’s only a week until the wedding, while the preparations continue Zeynep learns that she was cheated on. She goes to Foça to her most dear grandpa Muammer and aunt Ayla. However, she faints just before she could get there, right in front of Rüzgar’s house. She hides her true identity from everyone except Rüzgar. Afterwards, Zeynep is forced to see Kutay as her best friend Hande is getting married. Sibel, Başak and Hande think up a plan. But they need Rüzgar to make this plan work. Rüzgar can’t say no to this after hearing what happened to Zeynep. So a game of hearts begins between Zeynep and Rüzgar.
A CRAZY LOVE STORY

And she calls for those who have more to give more to people working to improve their communities. "Imagine what it would look like if you embraced isirika and made it your default," Kanyoro says. "What could we achieve for each other? For humanity?" Let's find out -- together.

Ethiopia is among the hardest-hit countries in terms of deadly traffic accidents. Trains and trucks circulate along infrastructure from another age. This one train travels through half of the country, from the city of Dire Dawa to the border at Djibouti. It travels 310 kilometres over the course of more than 10 hours – on a good day. Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back. Francois's trailer comes unhooked and all of his critters get loose.
Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back. Francois's trailer comes unhooked and all of his critters get loose.

programme.original_episode_title: Why Africa must become a center of knowledge again
programme.episode_description: How can Africa, the home to some of the largest bodies of water in the world, be said to have a water crisis? It doesn't, says Olúfẹ́mi Táíwò -- it has a knowledge crisis. Táíwò suggests that lack of knowledge on important topics like water and food is what stands between Africa's current state and a future of prosperity. In a powerful talk, he calls for Africa to make the production of knowledge within the continent rewarding and reclaim its position as a locus of learning on behalf of humanity.

programme.original_episode_title: Entering and Experiencing Kingdom Citizenship Part 1
programme.episode_description: This teaching is from the series entitled Kingdom First - Rediscovering God’s Priority Volume 4

Rüzgar goes to Bosnia after losing the woman he loves in a car crash two years ago, to run away from everything and everyone but mostly his memories.. He doesn’t make contact with anyone for two years, including his family. His uncle Kemaç and his mother Vahide who is the owner of a major corporation in Turkey, find Ruzgar after long efforts. So Kemal goes to Bosnia to bring Rüzgar back. But Rüzgar is still heartbroken. He can’t live like this so he runs away after a family dinner without telling anyone. He finds himself in Foça after meeting with a taxi driver. Meanwhile Zeynep is about to marry her childhood love Kutay. There’s only a week until the wedding, while the preparations continue Zeynep learns that she was cheated on. She goes to Foça to her most dear grandpa Muammer and aunt Ayla. However, she faints just before she could get there, right in front of Rüzgar’s house. She hides her true identity from everyone except Rüzgar. Afterwards, Zeynep is forced to see Kutay as her best friend Hande is getting married. Sibel, Başak and Hande think up a plan. But they need Rüzgar to make this plan work. Rüzgar can’t say no to this after hearing what happened to Zeynep. So a game of hearts begins between Zeynep and Rüzgar.
This week we’re in Kasutaime village in Mayuge and we want to see what our 35-year-old farmer, Gerald Machario, is doing on his 12 acres.

programme.episode_description: Will tries to get Ashley into the Christmas spirit, but his garish decorating annoys the neighbours, especially Evander Holyfield.
How Your Muscles Work
Captain Artemis and her group of soldiers are pulled into a world where dangerous monsters and humans co-exist. Grappled by danger, they must find a way to escape with help from a mysterious hunter.

programme.original_episode_title: Mission PAW: Quest for the Crown
programme.episode_description: Chase and the team get called to Barkingburg to keep an eye on the crown, but it quickly goes missing when they get distracted.
Lord Boateng

In Cameroon, only 2% of the roads have been asphalted. All of the country's inhabitants rely on the Clandos' taxi services, they have no other choice. The country has no railway and taking airplanes is both too expensive and too dangerous.
How Your Heart Works

programme.original_episode_title: 19 Years of Child Support But Is He the Father?
programme.episode_description: 1. Haralson v. Smith - After nineteen years of paying for child support, this Detriot man finally meets his alleged daughter yet denies paternity.
In the aftermath of the trip to Botswana, Mercy has an emotional conversation with Brinnette. Christall debuts her music career, and Evodia gets a shocking revelation at the dinner table.

In this deeply personal talk, she tells the story of how she became a refugee, living in camps in seven countries over the next six years -- and how she's tried to make sense of what came after.

Lord Boateng

Cameron Poe, a highly decorated Army Ranger, comes home to Alabama to his wife Tricia, only to run into a few drunken regulars at the bar where she works. Cameron accidentally kills one of the drunks, and is sent to a federal penitentiary for involuntary manslaughter for seven years. He becomes eligible for parole and can now go home to his wife and daughter. Unfortunately, Cameron has to share a prison airplane with some of the country's most dangerous criminals, who take control of the plane and are now planning to escape the country. Cameron has to find a way to stop them while playing along. Meanwhile, United States Marshal Vince Larkin is trying to help Cameron get free and stop the criminals, led by Cyrus "The Virus" Grissom.

programme.original_episode_title: How Prayer and Fasting Influence Earth
programme.episode_description: This teaching is entitled How Prayer and Fasting Influence Earth and is from the series Kingdom Culture Influence Volume 2 - The Kingdom Culture of Prayer. This series is available exclusively on our Munroe Global Media app and website.
